meanings.definition: A work of fiction that is not a novel.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading nonnovels because they are shorter than novels.
meanings.sent2: She decided to write a nonnovels collection of short stories instead of a novel.
meanings.sent3: The library had a special section dedicated to nonnovels, which made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her writing style is so unique that her nonnovels are like little gems in a sea of novels.
meanings.sent5: The nonnovels on the shelf caught my eye with their colorful covers.

meanings.definition: The act of not writing a novel.
meanings.sent1: His nonnovels were a result of writer's block and lack of inspiration.
meanings.sent2: The author's decision to focus on nonnovels surprised many of his fans.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her nonnovels were actually just blank pages with a title at the top.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of novels, his nonnovels stood out as a bold statement.
meanings.sent5: The concept of nonnovels intrigued me as a form of literary rebellion.
